The headline and content of the article: 2.4 billion from Social Security to fund impeachment.
The disclaimer on the website potatriots: com, where the article was published, stating that everything on the website is fiction and not real news.
Reactions and comments from users on soc: such as Facebook, showing that the article was believed as fact by some individuals.
Confirmation from the Social Security Ad: Dorothy Clark, stating that $2.4 billion was not withdrawn from Social Security to fund impeachment and providing information on how the trust funds are actually used.
